title: Concerning the temperature in a taxi
context: Ask the driver to turn the air conditioning up or down.

content.bestLine: Could you turn the air conditioning up/down, please?

neutral.text: Is it possible to adjust the temperature?
Can you turn the AC up/down?
I'm a bit cold/hot, could you help?
Could you make it a bit warmer/cooler?
Can you turn the temperature up/down?
I'd appreciate it if you could adjust the AC.
Could you please turn the air conditioning up/down?

informal.text: Hey, can you crank the AC?
Can you turn it up/down a notch?
Can you make it cooler/warmer in here?
Turn the AC up/down, would you?
Can you adjust the temperature, please?
I'm a bit chilly/hot, can you fix it?
Can you turn the heat/AC up/down?

formal.text: I would appreciate it if you could adjust the air conditioning.
Could you please adjust the temperature to a more comfortable level?
I am experiencing some discomfort due to the temperature, could you assist me?
Would you be so kind as to turn the air conditioning up/down?
I would like to request that you adjust the temperature, please.
Could you please turn the air conditioning to a more suitable temperature?

patterns.meaning: asking the driver to adjust the temperature

patterns.template: I'm feeling [options], could you adjust the [options]?
